column2: after 10 minutes of standing at the bar
column3: three seats opened up which we took immediately. We found out that the full menu is served at the bar - WAHOO! So
column4: we didn't have to end up waiting long at all. I ordered the pork belly pancake - amazingness. We also ordered the warm crab dip which I am obsessed with and want to eat it every day of my life.
